AzureBlade smiles. He wanted to tell her something, so, still in 
flight, he reversed on his back, goes a bit lower and under Mistra.

AzureBlade: This was a natural thing. But... there is something you 
must know... about who I am... and what I feel like...
I noticed you looked puzzled when I mentionned my brother, so I take 
it you do not know him. He and I were created by maximal scientists to 
have sparks as unbreakable as that of Starscream, the legendary 
immortal Decepticon. However, X turned... wrong. He began rampaging 
and eventually destroyed Colony Omicron. I was part of the team who 
caught him, but I went berserk and killed my commander. We were both 
sentenced to be marooned by the Axalon, and I woke up here, on Earth. 
I am constantly avoiding to fight because of this. I am trying to 
attone for my sins, and I hope that one day, I will be forgiven.
As for what pushed me to rescue you... I can feel the emotions of 
sparks, and when I saw yours... (There seems to be a lump in his 
throat) I found it beautiful! I did not want to mention it in front of 
Kali... Mistra, I think I fell in love with you...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., HanaKirei85@a... wrote:
> <<> AzureBlade thought for a moment, She was more lost than him when 
he 
> > first came online.
> > 
> > AzureBlade: I see. (He starts flying) It could be a problem either 
> > with your memory chips or your spark. As I said, we have some fine 
> > engineers at the base who can help you.>>
> 
> Mistra smiled gratefully at Azure, flying after him "That sounds 
wonderful." 
> It'd be nice to eventually just who she was...but as she'd said, her 
past was 
> like a dream. One she'd just woken up from. Maybe now was a 
chance...to start 
> things over? Like life continuing once a dream has ended?
> 
> > 
> > <<He takes on some speed, flying out of the forest, but not too 
fast so 
> > he does not lose her.>>
> 
> Speeding up, Mistra flew beside him. After a moment's pause, she 
said "Thank 
> you Azure...for everything you've done for me so far."
